headline: Is American Electric Power’s Strong 2025 Rally Supported by Its Dividend and Earnings Outlook?
summary: Thinking about what to do with American Electric Power Company stock? You are definitely not alone. The stock has been on a remarkable run this year, climbing 26.1% year-to-date and notching a robust 22.5% over the last twelve months. Even after a slight dip of 1.3% this past week, the longer-term momentum is hard to ignore, with gains of 45.6% over three years and 54.9% over five. The moves have not just been about market hype; a closer look reveals a backdrop of industry shifts and...
